Hi,

I was hopeing to use this control with windows phone 7. I have it working to the point that you can see the images and everything seems great but i noticed that the drag option does not work like it does in your sample. Is there a property to enable this? also are there any detailed guides?

You'd need to change the event handlers a little, but yeah.

 

Dunno if the Windows Marketplace team will necessarily like that though, could be breaking the UI guidelines.  After all I think it might even be patented by Apple.  Even if it isn't, it is an Apple concept.  Maybe see if you can find a different way to display your data?
